amendment.description: An amendment numbered 80 printed in Part B of House Report 118-269 to ensure none of the funds made available by this Act may be used to implement or enforce the final rule of the Securities and Exchange Commission titled "Cyber security Risk Management, Strategy, Governance, and Incident Disclosure" (88 Fed. Reg. 51896; published August 4, 2023).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Nunn (IA) amendment (A048) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Nunn (IA) amendment (A048) Agreed to by voice vote.
